link_desc:
Working on all Mikrotik routers, but not all position are used by each router.

Many of position like:

  • 3.3 voltage
  • 5 voltage
  • 12 voltage
  • Active fan
  • Board temperature
  • Core voltage
  • CPU frequency
  • CPU temperature
  • Current
  • DHCP leases
  • Fan Speed 1
  • Fan Speed 2
  • Power consumption
  • Processor temperature
  • PSU1 state
  • PSU2 state
  • Sensor temperature
  • Software ID
  • System name
  • System uptime
  • System version and hw
  • Temperature
  • Total disk space
  • Total memory
  • Used disk space
  • Used memory
  • Voltage

Two discover rules for:

  • CPU load (for all cores)
  • Network interfaces (all data, with traffic)

REMEMBER to set Trap Community to public

{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} = public

DISCOVERY RULES NOT WORK PROPERLY WITH VERSION 2.x
author: Tomasz Mikula
